string.value: The Committee Challenges

We found the 3rd Herb, but it is tightly sealed inside Lazy Buffy's Marble. It seems like it's been attached for so long, that I don't think we can just pluck it out of the sphere. Sabitrama then mentioned something like applying modern science to opening this. We've come so far, that there's no way we're about to give up.\nBut then again, who am I supposed to find?"

He may have talked too candidly on some things, but I think the herb can be plucked out of the marble. As part of the deal, I have to gather up #b500 #t04000133#s#k.


#t04000133# #b#c04000133##k/500

The seal is disabled, but since the marble itself isn't very stable, Dr. Kim made a device called "Open Sesami" and sent it to Sabitrama. I should go see him later. \nAnyway, he's pretty good at what he does, but man he's terrible at naming his inventions!
Did something happen? I'm very busy here creating the ultimate robot, so please don't bother me right now. Porter, please get this person out of here.
Hey, hey, what? Even a piece of jewelry like that will not stop my total devotion to robots. Please put it away. You're dealing with the wrong person here.
Porter, you fool! \nDon't make that face as if you want it! Don't you have pride? You're just...staring at it!
Eh? What? \nThat jewel is sealed with an ancient spell that contains unbelievable, mystical power?
So what? What do you want me to do? \nI'm not interested.
What? Is there something else? \nYou're telling me that marble contains one of the legendary "Big 3"?
Hmmm, I am not interested.
Wait a minute!\nDon't be so silly! With my vast knowledge of modern science, opening up stuff like that is a piece of cake. There isn't anything that Dr. Kim can't solve, okay? I can GUARANTEE it!
Gimme that. \nLet's see... hmmm ... so that's how it is. The ancient "technology" may be great, but it is no match for modern science, I mean, Dr. Kim!

...Hmmm.\nI think I found a way to remove it, but I can't give that away for free. If you gather up enough parts for my ultimate robot, then I'll think about it. Bring me #b500 #t04000133#s#k that can be found through Dual Pirates.
Hey, stop it! Are you still there? What? What? \nAre you saying it's something that even my great technological resources won't be able to break?
Alright, our deal is done.
I don't think you have anywhere else to count on to open this. I suggest you take care of it here...haha
How was it? Did you get a hold of the propeller?

Oh! I realized I asked you to get them, and you really did gather up all 500 of them. You must be the best there is right now in regards to hunting. I know I've said some harsh things, but let's just let bygones be bygones.
The seal is already off. \nThis is the marble minus the seal. Hey hey, be careful! It's a very sensitive item. If you touch it too hard, then everything inside will pop out!
You don't want to open it by yourself, right? \nI know, I know. With my new "Open Sesame", however, that will not be a problem. It'd be nice to send this to Sabitrama at Area 7-2.
And your uncompromising attitude, I like that quite a bit. Porter cannot come close to you in terms of that quality. This is my gift to you! Please take it.
I don't think you have enough. I know it's hard, but keep grinding.
